    "# Example usage\n",
    "\n",
    "To use `labtools` in a project:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Imports"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",

    "scrolled": true

   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from labtools import shuffle"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Shuffle a sequence\n",
    "\n",
    "Create shuffles of the alphabet:"
   ]
